item.description:
TMDB Hosts 自动更新与同步 DnsParse 脚本 & 本地版 🌟

本文介绍一套用于自动更新 TMDB 相关域名的 DNS 解析记录，并将其同步到常用媒体服务（如 Emby、Nastools）的本地脚本工具集。所有脚本均可直接在本地运行，无需依赖远程资源。

  • 🐱GitHub项目地址： https://github.com/myzhongqiang/DNS-TMDB/tree/main

📖 目录导航

  • ✨ 脚本特点与功能
  • 🐍 安装 Python3
  • 🔧 DnsParse.py 本地配置
  • ⏰ 计划任务设置
  • 📋 查看执行结果

✨ 脚本特点与功能

  • 🌐 多 DNS 提供商支持：使用多个公共 DNS 解析服务获取最新的 IP 地址，提高解析成功率。
  • 🏓 智能 IP 筛选：自动 Ping 测试所有解析到的 IP，仅保留可连通的高质量 IP。
  • 💾 无损更新 Hosts：采用标记块（###start### 与 ###end###）方式更新，保留原有 hosts 内容。
  • 📂 多服务同步：支持将更新后的 hosts 文件自动同步到 Emby 和 Nastools 的配置目录。
  • ⏰ 完全本地化：所有脚本和配置均存储在本地，无需网络访问即可执行。

sudo apt update && sudo apt install python3 -y

import datetime
import json
import platform
import requests
from subprocess import Popen, PIPE

# dns解析用到的api
api = "http://api.ip33.com/dns/resolver"

# 待解析的域名
hosts = ["api.themoviedb.org", "image.tmdb.org", "www.themoviedb.org"]

# dns服务商
dnsProvider = ["156.154.70.1", "208.67.222.222"]

# host文件的位置
hostLocate = "/etc/hosts"

# 批量ping
def pingBatch(ips):
    if ips is not None and type(ips) == list:
        for ip in ips[:]:  # 使用[:]复制ips列表，以避免在迭代时修改原列表
            result = pingIp(ip)
            if not result:
                ips.remove(ip)

# ping ip返回ip是否连通
def pingIp(ip) -> bool:
    try:
        ping_process = Popen(["ping", "-c", "1", ip], stdout=PIPE, stderr=PIPE)
        ping_output, ping_error = ping_process.communicate()
        if ping_process.returncode == 0:
            print(f"[√] IP:{ip}  可以ping通")
            return True
        else:
            print(f"[×] IP:{ip}  无法ping通")
            return False
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Ping IP:{ip} 出错：{str(e)}")
        return False

# 返回host对应domain的解析结果列表
def analysis(domain, dns) -> list:
    params = {
        "domain": domain,
        "type": "A",
        "dns": dns
    }
    headers = {
        "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/117.0.2045.60"
    }
    try:
        response = requests.post(url=api, data=params, headers=headers)
        ipDics = json.loads(response.text)["record"]
        ips = [dic["ip"] for dic in ipDics]
        return ips
    except Exception as e:
        print("解析dns出错：")
        print(e)

# 写入host信息
def hostWritor(hostDic):
    platInfo = platform.platform().UPER()
    if "LINUX" in platInfo:
        hostFile = "/etc/hosts"
    else:
        print("未能识别当前操作系统，且用户未指定host文件所在目录！")
        return

    origin = ""
    with open(hostFile, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        # 之前是否已经写过dns信息
        flag = False
        for eachLine in f.readlines():
            if r"###start###" in eachLine:
                flag = True
            elif r"###end###" in eachLine:
                flag = False
            else:
                if not flag:
                    origin = origin + eachLine
        # 写入新的host记录
        origin = origin.strip()
        origin = origin + "\n###start###\n"
        for eachHost in hostDic:
            for eachIp in hostDic[eachHost]:
                origin = origin + eachIp + "\t" + eachHost + "\n"
        origin = origin + "###最后更新时间:%s###\n" % datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
        origin = origin + "###end###\n"

    with open(hostFile, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
        f.write(origin)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    resultDic = {}
    for host in hosts:
        for dns in dnsProvider:
            records = analysis(host, dns)
            pingBatch(records)
            if records is not None and len(records) > 0:
                if host not in resultDic:
                    resultDic[host] = records
                else:
                    resultDic[host] += records
    hostWritor(resultDic)
EOF

#!/bin/bash

# 🎨 颜色定义
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${BLUE}🚀 Home目录同步任务开始...${NC}"
echo "========================================"

start_time=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
start_timestamp=$(date +%s)

# 检查rsync安装
if ! command -v rsync &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}📦 rsync未安装，正在安装...${NC}"
    if apt-get update && apt-get install -y rsync; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}✅ rsync安装成功${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}❌ rsync安装失败${NC}" >&2
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# ================= 配置区域 =================
source_dir="/mnt/mydisk/home/"
target_dirs=(
    "/mnt/Ubuntu-NFS/home/"
    # 添加更多目标目录...
)
# ===========================================

echo -e "${BLUE}🎯 目标目录:${NC}"
for target in "${target_dirs[@]}"; do
    echo "  📍 ${target}"
done

# 同步函数
sync_directory() {
    local src=$1
    local dst=$2
    local name=$3
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}🔄 同步到 ${name}...${NC}"
    
    # 创建目标目录（如果不存在）
    mkdir -p "$dst"
    
    # 执行rsync同步
    rsync -avhzp --progress --delete \
        --exclude='*.tmp' \
        --exclude='.cache/' \
        --exclude='.trash/' \
        "$src" "$dst" 2>&1
    
    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}✅ ${name} 同步成功${NC}"
        return 0
    else
        echo -e "${RED}❌ ${name} 同步失败${NC}"
        return 1
    fi
}

# 执行同步
success_count=0
for i in "${!target_dirs[@]}"; do
    sync_directory "$source_dir" "${target_dirs[$i]}" "目标$((i+1))"
    [ $? -eq 0 ] && ((success_count++))
done

# 输出统计信息
end_time=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
end_timestamp=$(date +%s)
total_time=$((end_timestamp - start_timestamp))

echo "========================================"
echo -e "${GREEN}📊 同步完成统计:${NC}"
echo -e "开始时间: ${start_time}"
echo -e "结束时间: ${end_time}"
echo -e "总耗时: ${total_time} 秒"
echo -e "成功同步: ${success_count}/${#target_dirs[@]} 个目标"
echo -e "源目录: ${source_dir}"
echo "========================================"

if [ $success_count -eq ${#target_dirs[@]} ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}🎉 所有同步任务成功完成！${NC}"
    exit 0
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}⚠️  部分同步任务失败，请检查日志${NC}"
    exit 1
fi
EOF

backup_count=3  # 保留的备份数量
# ===========================================

# 创建时间戳
current_date=$(date '+%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')
backup_file="${target_dir}/home_${current_date}.tar.gz"

echo -e "${BLUE}📁 源目录: ${source_dir}${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}💾 目标文件: ${backup_file}${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}📊 保留备份: ${backup_count} 个${NC}"

# 检查源目录是否存在
if [ ! -d "$source_dir" ]; then
    echo -e "${RED}❌ 源目录不存在: ${source_dir}${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# 创建目标目录
mkdir -p "$target_dir"

# 执行压缩备份
echo -e "${YELLOW}🔄 正在压缩...${NC}"
tar -czvf "$backup_file" -C "$(dirname "$source_dir")" "$(basename "$source_dir")" 2>/dev/null

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    # 获取文件大小
    file_size=$(du -h "$backup_file" | awk '{print $1}')
    echo -e "${GREEN}✅ 压缩成功: ${file_size}${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${RED}❌ 压缩失败${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# 清理旧备份
echo -e "${YELLOW}🧹 清理旧备份...${NC}"
cd "$target_dir" || exit 1
backup_files=$(ls -t home_*.tar.gz 2>/dev/null | wc -l)

if [ "$backup_files" -gt "$backup_count" ]; then
    files_to_delete=$(ls -t home_*.tar.gz | tail -n +$((backup_count + 1)))
    echo "$files_to_delete" | xargs rm -f
    echo -e "${GREEN}✅ 已清理 $(echo "$files_to_delete" | wc -l) 个旧备份${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${BLUE}📊 当前备份数: ${backup_files}, 无需清理${NC}"
fi

# 输出统计信息
end_time=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
end_timestamp=$(date +%s)
total_time=$((end_timestamp - start_timestamp))

echo "========================================"
echo -e "${GREEN}📊 备份完成统计:${NC}"
echo -e "开始时间: ${start_time}"
echo -e "结束时间: ${end_time}"
echo -e "总耗时: ${total_time} 秒"
echo -e "备份文件: ${backup_file}"
echo -e "文件大小: ${file_size}"
echo -e "当前备份数: $(ls -t home_*.tar.gz 2>/dev/null | wc -l)/${backup_count}"
echo "========================================"
echo -e "${GREEN}🎉 备份任务完成！${NC}"
EOF
